topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: nwIRC
short_description: nwIRC is a small console IRC client for Unix systems. It works without third-party libraries and has been tested on Free/Net/OpenBSD, Darwin, Solaris, HP-UX, OSF1/Tru64, IRIX, AIX, Linux and Cygwin. Key features are multiserver/IPv6/DCC/modules support
